Find out how to make yours the exception.</description>     <dc:date>2014-12-19T12:04:34Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/could-students-decide-the-next-election">     <title>Could students decide the next election?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/could-students-decide-the-next-election</link>     <description>A report suggests that students could tip the balance in the next general election \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd but many aren't registered to vote.</description>     <dc:date>2014-12-02T13:43:37Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/anti-bullying-week-2014">     <title>Anti-Bullying Week 2014</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/anti-bullying-week-2014</link>     <description>Anti-Bullying Week runs from 17th to 21st November.</description>     <dc:date>2014-11-17T14:15:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/which-universities-have-the-best-support-for-lgb-students">     <title>Which universities have the best support for LGB students?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/which-universities-have-the-best-support-for-lgb-students</link>     <description>Gay rights charity Stonewall says more universities are \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdgay friendly\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd than ever before.</description>     <dc:date>2014-09-19T13:38:49Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/improve-your-public-speaking">     <title>Improve your public speaking</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/improve-your-public-speaking</link>     <description>Most people are afraid of speaking in front of a group. Improving your skills can help you beat the fear - and there are other benefits, too.</description>     <dc:date>2014-07-30T16:49:33Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/expulsion-exclusion-and-suspension-explained">     <title>Expulsion, exclusion and suspension explained</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/expulsion-exclusion-and-suspension-explained</link>     <description>Get the essential facts about when you can be excluded, what happens, and what your rights are.</description>     <dc:date>2013-12-19T15:53:31Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/where-can-i-go-for-legal-advice">     <title>Where can I go for legal advice?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/where-can-i-go-for-legal-advice</link>     <description>Having legal trouble but can't afford to see a solicitor? Find out where you can get reliable advice for free.</description>     <dc:date>2013-11-05T17:18:47Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/finding-out-youre-pregnant-at-university">     <title>Finding out you're pregnant at university</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/finding-out-youre-pregnant-at-university</link>     <description>Becoming pregnant at university doesn't mean you'll have to drop out. Find out about what to do and the support that's available.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-16T15:36:23Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/trade-unions-explained">     <title>Trade unions explained</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/trade-unions-explained</link>     <description>Find out what trade unions are, how they can help you, and how to join.</description>     <dc:date>2013-06-03T16:09:54Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/care-leavers-and-university">     <title>Care leavers and university</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/care-leavers-and-university</link>     <description>Find out about the range of support available if you\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdre planning on going to university after leaving care.</description>     <dc:date>2013-02-06T16:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/stopping-bullying">     <title>Stopping bullying</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/stopping-bullying</link>     <description>Bullying doesn\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt just start in the school playground, and you can put an end to it wherever and whoever you are. Read on to find out what to do if you\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve got a problem with bullying, and where to go for help.</description>     <dc:date>2012-11-08T17:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-at-work">     <title>Your rights at work</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-at-work</link>     <description>Find out about the legal rights that protect you when you are an employee.</description>     <dc:date>2012-10-08T12:35:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/useful-links">     <title>Useful links</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/useful-links</link>     <description>Visit these websites for more advice on money, accommodation, preparing for university and much more.</description>     <dc:date>2011-11-15T17:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/independent-living/safer-internet-day">     <title>Safer Internet Day</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/independent-living/safer-internet-day</link>     <description>Today is the 8th annual Safer Internet Day, promoting the best ways to protect yourself online. Read on to find out more. Many people spend hours on social...</description>     <dc:date>2011-02-08T10:40:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/health/can-housework-prevent-cancer">     <title>Can housework prevent cancer?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/health/can-housework-prevent-cancer</link>     <description>Does cleaning up your house always seem like a chore? Maybe the news that doing the housework can help prevent cancer will convince you to pick up a duster...</description>     <dc:date>2010-09-01T11:52:20Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/online-help-for-young-people">     <title>Online help for young people</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/online-help-for-young-people</link>     <description>Can't find what you're looking for on this website? There are loads of places you can go to get the answers. Check out the following links for relevant tips, support and specific information.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/advice-for-life-need-someone-to-talk-to">     <title>Advice for life: need someone to talk to?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/advice-for-life-need-someone-to-talk-to</link>     <description>Whether you\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdre a school or university student, sometimes personal worries can become overwhelming. Luckily, there is free, confidential advice available for nearly any problem that comes up.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/online-dyslexia-advice">     <title>Online dyslexia advice</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/online-dyslexia-advice</link>     <description>Check out these organisations and websites for advice and support for people with dyslexia.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/dyslexic-celebrities">     <title>Dyslexic celebrities</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/dyslexic-celebrities</link>     <description>Find out which multi-millionaires overcame their learning difficulties to forge successful careers. </description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/dyslexia-study-tips">     <title>Dyslexia study tips</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/dyslexia-study-tips</link>     <description>Anyone with dyslexia knows that studying can be very frustrating. Follow these study tips to help break down the barriers. </description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/dyslexia-and-science-an-inside-view">     <title>Dyslexia and science: an inside view</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/dyslexia-and-science-an-inside-view</link>     <description>Anthony Brewer is in his third year of a physics degree at the University of Leicester but after failing his GCSE exams at school, he started working in a factory that made TV aerials and his future did not look quite so exciting.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/criminal-records-who-can-help">     <title>Criminal records: Who can help?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/criminal-records-who-can-help</link>     <description>There is a lot of support available for people with criminal records who want to put their past behind them.  Take a look at the following organisations that may be able to help you move on. </description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-when-dealing-with-the-police-and-courts">     <title>Your rights when dealing with the police and courts</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-when-dealing-with-the-police-and-courts</link>     <description>Discover what your rights are when dealing with the police or the legal system.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-when-dealing-with-the-health-service">     <title>Your rights when dealing with the health service</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-when-dealing-with-the-health-service</link>     <description>Discover what your rights are when dealing with doctors, receiving treatment or viewing your medical history.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-when-dealing-with-childrens-services">     <title>Your rights when dealing with children's services</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-when-dealing-with-childrens-services</link>     <description>Discover what your rights are when dealing with family courts, social workers or living in care.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-to-be-heard-at-school">     <title>Your rights to be heard at school</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/your-rights-to-be-heard-at-school</link>     <description>As students you have the right to speak out about your education and how your school is run.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/caring-for-someone">     <title>Caring for someone</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/practical-advice/caring-for-someone</link>     <description>Find out what support is available for you if you are responsible for caring for a relative or friend who\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds suffering from a disability or the effects of old age.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>
